title: SQL
text:
SQL

if(!require("tidyverse"))
  install.packages("tidyverse")

  library(tidyverse)

if(!require("RSQLite"))
  install.packages("RSQLite")

Loading required package: RSQLite

  library(RSQLite)

if(!require("DBI"))
  install.packages("DBI")

Loading required package: DBI

  library(DBI)

# interactive plots
if(!require("plotly"))
  install.packages("plotly")

Loading required package: plotly

Attaching package: 'plotly'

The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2':

    last_plot

The following object is masked from 'package:stats':

The following object is masked from 'package:graphics':

library(plotly)

# support for color blind users - see scale_color_colorblind() below
if(!require("ggthemes"))
  install.packages("ggthemes")

Loading required package: ggthemes

library(ggthemes)

# allows paginated tables
if(!require("DT"))
  install.packages("DT")

Loading required package: DT

library(DT)

if(!require("kableExtra"))
  install.packages("kableExtra")

Loading required package: kableExtra

Attaching package: 'kableExtra'

The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr':

    group_rows

  library(kableExtra)

if(!require("ggplot2"))
  install.packages("ggplot2")
  library(ggplot2)

conn <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "virtual_production.db")
dbListTables(conn)

 [1] "Assets"           "Clients"          "CrewMembers"      "Environments"    
 [5] "Equipment"        "ProductionCrew"   "Productions"      "SessionEquipment"
 [9] "ShootingSessions" "VCamTakes"       



query <- "SELECT Budget FROM Productions"
result <- dbGetQuery(conn, query)


query_step1 <- "
SELECT 
  p.Title,
  p.Budget,
  c.Country
FROM Productions p
JOIN Clients c ON p.ClientID = c.ClientID
LIMIT 10
"

result_step1 <- dbGetQuery(conn, query_step1)
result_step1

            Title Budget Country
1     Eclipse Run 350000   Japan
2 Starborn Legacy 500000 Germany
3      Neon Pulse 420000   Japan
4    Echo Station 280000      UK
5  Gravity Dreams 600000      UK
6   Quantum Drift 450000 Germany
